title: Fibonacci Sequence Generator
description: The Fibonacci sequence is a series of numbers in which each number is the sum of the two preceding ones. It starts with 0 and 1, and the next number is the sum of the previous two numbers. In this challenge, you will write a function that generates a list containing the Fibonacci sequence up until the nth term.

meta.title: Fibonacci Sequence | Programming Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function that generates the Fibonacci sequence up to the nth term. Improve your coding skills with this engaging programming challenge.
meta.keywords: Fibonacci sequence, programming challenge, Python function, coding skills, algorithm

verify.name: Verify Fibonacci Sequence Python Script
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 斐波那契数列生成器
i18n.description: 斐波那契数列是一系列数字，其中每个数字都是前两个数字之和。它从0和1开始，下一个数字是前两个数字之和。在这个挑战中，你将编写一个函数，生成一个包含直到第n项的斐波那契数列的列表。

meta.title: 斐波那契数列 | 编程挑战
meta.description: 学习如何编写一个Python函数，生成直到第n项的斐波那契数列。通过这个引人入胜的编程挑战提升你的编码技能。
meta.keywords: 斐波那契数列, 编程挑战, Python函数, 编码技能, 算法
